_source.short_desc: With ShipStation, you can find the best rates, print a label, or batch orders for rapid multi-label creation.
_source.long_desc: ShipStation helps merchants quickly generate discounted shipping labels for all of their online orders. With ShipStation, you can connect all of your carriers and order sources in one place. ShipStation not only gives you the ability to integrate all of your selling channels and carrier accounts, but we also make the entire order management and shipping experience simple. With just a few clicks, you can spend more time selling and less time shipping.
_source.pricing_details:
Starter - $9/month
Bronze - $29/month
Silver - $49/month
Gold - $69/month
Platinum - $99/month
Enterprise - $159/month
_source.target_audience: ShipStation is a web-based shipping software that was designed for the multi-channel merchant. Anyone who sells on multiple platforms (eBay, Amazon, etc.) & ships physical goods can save time & money.

category_features.name: Shipment Price Calculation
category_features.definition: Calculation of shipment price based on size, weight, route, timeframe, and carrier.

category_features.name: Shipment Tracking
category_features.definition: The software will assign a tracking number associated to the order number to track the physical progress of the package in delivery.

related_products.short_desc: E-commerce shipping fulfillment software that integrates with over 50 platforms and qualifies you for the lowest rates on shipping.
related_products.features: ShippingEasy is the easiest online shipping, tracking, and customer marketing platform for e-commerce sellers. Integrate from over 50 stores and marketplaces, reduce costs with the lowest available USPS and UPS shipping rates, or connect your UPS/FedEx account. Optimize order fulfillment with powerful automation and batch printing. Try it free for 30 days!

related_products.short_desc: Pirate Ship is free shipping software that passes through the cheapest USPS rates with no markup. Top choice for small businesses!
related_products.features:
Get the cheapest USPS shipping rates possible with no fees! (We really mean it). 

Pirate Ship is the only free web-based shipping software that gives you the cheapest rates for USPS-approved postage with absolutely no markup, fees or monthly commitments.

Fast and reliable shipping software built for modern small businesses. Import your ecommerce orders to quickly buy and print labels. 

Sign up for your free account and start shipping in minutes!

related_products.short_desc: Deliver by design - at every stage of e-commerce complexity. Start shipping with Shippo, free.
related_products.features: Ecommerce is complex. Shipping doesn't have to be. Shippo connects you with the best rates at the most carriers using a solution integrated with your business and experienced support at every stage so you can grow into the future. Manage shipping for all of your sales channels and get access to exclusive discounts from USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL + 80 more, automated workflows, detailed tracking and notifications, seamless returns, international customs declarations, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Compare your contracted pricing, schedule pickups, prepare bills of lading, print labels, track data about your freight shipping.
related_products.features: If you ship LTL freight or parcel, you can use Freightview to pull all of your negotiated LTL and parcel rates into one place so it's easy to compare your options and pick the best one. Then you can schedule pickups, prepare bills of lading, print shipping labels and track your shipments from pickup to delivery. Our unified address book means you never have to type an address twice. Plus you can visualize all of your shipping data as charts, graphs, reports and spreadsheet download.

related_products.short_desc: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management, and order management solution with best-in-class built-in EDI and 700 integrations.
related_products.features: Cin7 is a highly configurable inventory management and order management solution with built-in EDI and integrations to all the popular eCommerce platforms, marketplaces, and 3PLs. It's best-in-class for all combinations of B2B and D2C sales channels, warehouses, shipping, and fulfillment. Cin7 provides exceptional automations, workflows, reports, and analysis to enable brands, retailers, and wholesalers to operate efficiently as they scale and efficiently match demand to supply.

related_products.short_desc: QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of products.
related_products.features:
QuickBooks Commerce enables you to manage inventory and orders for your multichannel business and keep track of your products as you sell and restock across multiple warehouse locations and channels. 

QuickBooks Commerce allows brands to automate and integrate their commerce platforms and get powerful insights into all their sales data on-demand.

related_products.short_desc: The only NO Fee, NO Contract, NO Setup TMS. Over 47,833+ users. TRUE cloud TMS. The World's Most Popular TMS. Capterra's BEST RATING!
related_products.features: AscendTMS is the world's most popular TMS software (47,833+ active users), for Freight Brokers, 3PL's, Trucking Companies and Shippers. NO upfront fees, NO license fees, NO support fees, NO contracts. They are 100% independent and NOT affiliated with any broker, carrier, or other transportation entity. Get instant TMS access from ANY device with NO installs, NO hardware, NO setup. Compare to TMW, McLeod, Mercury Gate, Aljex and other old legacy systems. AscendTMS has Capterra's BEST RATING!

related_products.short_desc: Grow your business with multi-channel shipping software to invite lowest shipping rates and real-time shipment tracking system.
related_products.features: Ship orders faster with Orderhive, economical shipping software that enables you to streamline shipping pipeline by integrating with global shipping carriers like USPS, DHL, FedEx, UPS and more. With Orderhive, you can choose the best shipping options, calculate shipping costs with an in-built shipping calculator and compare rates according to package sizes, weight, place and delivery date.

related_products.short_desc: Shipping software that helps businesses manage delivery, track status, verify addresses, calculate costs and more.
related_products.features: Shipping software that helps businesses manage delivery, track status, verify addresses, calculate costs and more.

related_products.short_desc: Easyship is a end-to-end logistics platform for global commerce. Sync your store, ship with 250+ shipping solutions and save up to 70%.
related_products.features: Easyship is the worlds leading cloud-based shipping technology platform that helps eCommerce merchants ship their products globally. As a user-centric product, Easyship has helped to simplify the complex world of cross-border logistics for more than 40,000 clients worldwide; with exclusive rates from leading couriers, on-demand pickup requests, and a dashboard to track every shipment, we've got your logistics operations covered from checkout to delivery.

similar_products.short_desc: 2Ship is a powerful web based solution from shipping envelopes, to small packages, to a LTL/FTL multi carrier SaaS platform.
similar_products.features:
2Ship is an online, multi-carrier shipping platform built for businesses who have ecommerce webstores and marketplaces looking to connect to the right carrier and carrier's service for every shipment. Shipping anywhere from envelopes to parcels from same day to next day couriers, and skids with LTL/FTL services under one platform. 2Ship's scalability can support your shipping operation, whether it's 1, 100, 1,000 or 10,000 packages a day. 

We love to ship, and we know you'll love 2Ship too!

similar_products.short_desc: Shop, ship, save, track, audit, and analyze, all with one login. Smart AI shipping software for all modes: Parcel, LTL/FTL, Intl Air.
similar_products.features: The premier cloud-based shipping software powered by AI, makes shipping simple with one login for all inbound and outbound transportation management across parcel, LTL, FTL, ocean, and air. Seamless integration into your ERP and order system, and configurable to your existing workflows. With connections to 600+ carriers, brokers, & marketplaces, getting the best rates and optimizing shipping processes is easy. Trusted by Amazon, ebay, Toshiba, and Kyocera. Not for freight forwarders.

similar_products.short_desc: The Digital Freight Platform That Accelerates Growth
similar_products.features: Manage all of your shipping operations in a single platform, from rates and quotes to customs compliance, warehouse operations, tracking, accounting, customer service... and more! Avoid double data entry, save time, and bust operational silos by creating bookings, pickup orders, warehouse receipts, shipments, invoices, all in one easy-to-use Digital Freight Platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Keep drivers and shippers moving forward with seamless experiences.
similar_products.features: Manage transportation logistics at every stage of the journey. Whether shippers want to request pricing, check cargo conditions, or track shipments, they can do it all on the world's #1 CRM. Provide proactive service, send alerts, and answer questions accurately with a 360-degree view of shippers and consignees, and the transportation supply chain. Salesforce streamlines the entire shipping experience by integrating all of your systems and data onto a single platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Shipup turns eCommerce delivery notifications/pages into marketing campaigns. Boost your NPS & CLV, and reduce your delivery tickets.
similar_products.features:
Top shipment tracking solution driven by customer experience success.
Ecommerce brands take control over the most volatile part of the customer experience -the post-purchase- so they increase brand loyalty & save support cost

Display ads, product reco, or even promo codes in this new customer communication channel with a highly qualified audience (emails with a massive 65% open rate). Boost your rate of repetitive purchase (up to +20%) while reducing call center delivery tickets (up to -80%).

similar_products.short_desc: Enveyo's shipping software provides views of your enterprise-level shipping program to help you remove manual processes and save time.
similar_products.features: Enveyo's shipping software is designed from the ground up to provide views of your enterprise-level shipping program that are both comprehensive and hyper-detailed - helping you remove manual processes and save time. With increasing supply chain challenges and rising customer expectations, parcel shippers require more than what traditional solutions provide. What you need is a parcel shipping platform that helps you optimize operations and deliver more to the end customer. You need Enveyo.

similar_products.short_desc: Compare your contracted pricing, schedule pickups, prepare bills of lading, print labels, track data about your freight shipping.
similar_products.features: If you ship LTL freight or parcel, you can use Freightview to pull all of your negotiated LTL and parcel rates into one place so it's easy to compare your options and pick the best one. Then you can schedule pickups, prepare bills of lading, print shipping labels and track your shipments from pickup to delivery. Our unified address book means you never have to type an address twice. Plus you can visualize all of your shipping data as charts, graphs, reports and spreadsheet download.

similar_products.short_desc: Pirate Ship is free shipping software that passes through the cheapest USPS rates with no markup. Top choice for small businesses!
similar_products.features:
Get the cheapest USPS shipping rates possible with no fees! (We really mean it). 

Pirate Ship is the only free web-based shipping software that gives you the cheapest rates for USPS-approved postage with absolutely no markup, fees or monthly commitments.

Fast and reliable shipping software built for modern small businesses. Import your ecommerce orders to quickly buy and print labels. 

Sign up for your free account and start shipping in minutes!

similar_products.short_desc: E-commerce shipping fulfillment software that integrates with over 50 platforms and qualifies you for the lowest rates on shipping.
similar_products.features: ShippingEasy is the easiest online shipping, tracking, and customer marketing platform for e-commerce sellers. Integrate from over 50 stores and marketplaces, reduce costs with the lowest available USPS and UPS shipping rates, or connect your UPS/FedEx account. Optimize order fulfillment with powerful automation and batch printing. Try it free for 30 days!

similar_products.short_desc: Integrates into all major ecommerce platforms & allows for inventory management, order fulfillment, and real-time billing and support.
similar_products.features: Shipfusion is a warehouse and shipping management solution designed to help eCommerce retailers store, manage, and track inventory across temperature-controlled warehouses. The platform enables managers to streamline freight, insurance, and return management processes. Administrators can utilize the system dashboard to view shipments, key milestones, inventory levels, fee breakdowns, shipping summary, and more in real-time. It also performs quality control checks on various stock items.

similar_products.short_desc: By using Logitude's digital freight forwarding software, your time and effort are best used to increase the efficiency of your services
similar_products.features: Increase your revenue and reduce the overhead expenses of your freight forwarding operations by using Logitude World; the automated software that helps you manage the full freight forwarding life cycle. Logitude's cloud solution allows you to handle all operations on one sophisticated platform that can be customized to your business needs. Logitude World, with its detailed features, is your solution to optimize your operations and maximize efficiency. Would you like to get a free demo?

similar_products.short_desc: Multi-carrier shipping solution built for the enterprise. Ship FedEx, UPS, DHL, USPS, LTL and more. Windows and IBM i (iSeries/AS400)
similar_products.features: GlobalShip is an enterprise-class, multi-carrier shipping software that delivers significant cost benefits for small businesses and large corporations alike. GlobalShip enables a higher level of efficiency, productivity, and profitability through intelligently automated small parcel and LTL shipping. You can embed GlobalShip functionality into your existing business applications using simple API tools and integrate with RF scanners, scales and material handling automation. Windows & iSeries.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Courier software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Courier tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Courier software is used to manage package delivery services. Order entry, dispatch, route scheduling, job assignment, carrier pay, billing, GPS, and sales analysis are all features of this type of software. Email notifications and special instruction fields for drivers can also be available. Courier software is related to Shipping software, Trucking software, Service Dispatch software, Distribution software, and Logistics software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Distribution software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Distribution tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Distribution software manages processes including inventory tracking and warehousing. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Distribution solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as channel monitoring features. Distribution software often provides integration for sales, purchase orders and pricing information, vendor and customer contact information along with accounting and business reporting tools. Distribution software is related to Logistics software, Shipping software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Freight software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Freight tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Freight software is designed for organizations that deal with logistics, freight management, and freight brokering for both domestic and international shipments. These solutions can handle ocean, ground, and air freight and combine warehousing systems with accounting capabilities. Freight software is related to Logistics software, Shipping software and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Logistics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Logistics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Logistics software automates warehousing, transportation management, shipping and other logistical functions, monitoring the flow of products from supplier to end user. These applications provide a wide variety of features including: inventory control, warehousing, purchasing and receiving, sales and shipping, barcode / RFID scanning and label printing. Logistics solutions typically offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting, and business reporting tools. Logistics software is related to Distribution software, RFID software, Shipping software, Trucking software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mailroom Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mailroom Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mailroom Management software helps organizations to manage their mailing and shipping activities. These solutions have features that include postal accounting, reporting and rate shopping. Other features may include label printing and parcel tracking abilities. Mailroom Management software is related to Shipping software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Supply Chain Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Supply Chain Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Supply Chain Management software automates the flow of processes from raw materials through to delivery of finished goods to the consumer. These applications allow for organization-wide order processing, transportation and warehouse management along with planning and forecasting tools. Supply Chain Management software provides for efficient operation through the distribution and synchronization of this key data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Supply Chain Management software is related to Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Transportation Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Transportation Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Transportation Dispatch software allows dispatchers to view, track and manage dispatch activities from one central location. These solutions can track courier, delivery, service vehicles and trucking data. Shipment needs can be matched with available resources where optimal routes and loads can be determined. Transportation Dispatch software is related to Trucking software, Fleet Management software, Shipping Management software, Courier software, Service Dispatch software, and Logistics software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Warehouse Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Warehouse Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Warehouse Management software enables the movement, tracking and storage of materials throughout the warehouse. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Warehouse Management solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as procurement management and channel monitoring features. They also offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting and business reporting tools. Warehouse Management software is related to Distribution software and Logistics software.

pricing_plans.name: Starter
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 50 shipments per month

pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 3000 shipments and requires 3 users.

pricing_plans.name: Platinum
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 6000 shipments and requires 5 users.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 10000 shipments and requires 10 users.

related_products.short_desc: Motive, formerly KeepTruckin, builds technology to improve the safety, productivity, and profitability of businesses.
related_products.features: Motive, formerly KeepTruckin, builds technology to improve the safety, productivity, and profitability of businesses that power the physical economy. The Motive Automated Operations Platform combines IoT hardware with AI-powered applications to automate vehicle and equipment tracking, driver safety, compliance, maintenance, spend management, and more. Motive serves more than 120,000 businesses in trucking and logistics, construction, oil and gas, food and beverage, field service & agriculture.

Plus you can visualize all of your shipping data as charts, graphs, reports and spreadsheet download.

Routing chaos finally solved! Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me plans routes for your business.

Call Today & Get Started

related_products.features:
Routing chaos finally solved. Extremely easy-to-use, Route4Me automatically plans routes for your business and dispatches them to a mobile app with built-in navigation. 

Perfect for field service, field sales, field marketing, territory management, and every business requiring last-mile optimization.

Route4Me provides the world's most used route sequencing and optimization software for small businesses and enterprises to over 35,000 customers.

Call Today & Get Started

related_products.short_desc: Powered by Truckstop.com, the most-used, affordable & user-friendly TMS for small to medium companies.
related_products.features: Truckstop.com's flagship TMS, ITS Dispatch is the number one trucking & freight broker solution in North America. With over 50,000 satisfied users, ITS is the most affordable, easy-to-use web-based TMS for small to medium-sized companies. Get the crucial tools needed to organize and grow your business, including one-click invoicing, automatic IFTA reporting, complete load management & Quickbooks integration with unlimited users & FREE unlimited expert support. Request a LIVE DEMO today!

related_products.short_desc: The only NO Fee, NO Contract, NO Setup TMS. Over 47,833+ users. TRUE cloud TMS. The World's Most Popular TMS. Capterra's BEST RATING!
related_products.features: AscendTMS is the world's most popular TMS software (47,833+ active users), for Freight Brokers, 3PL's, Trucking Companies and Shippers. NO upfront fees, NO license fees, NO support fees, NO contracts. They are 100% independent and NOT affiliated with any broker, carrier, or other transportation entity. Get instant TMS access from ANY device with NO installs, NO hardware, NO setup. Compare to TMW, McLeod, Mercury Gate, Aljex and other old legacy systems. AscendTMS has Capterra's BEST RATING!

related_products.short_desc: Streamline your fleet operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for GPS tracking, safety, ELD compliance and more.
related_products.features: Streamline your operations and reduce costs with Samsaras all-in-one platform for fleet management. Live-to-the-second GPS tracking shows your vehicles in real time and pairs with rich reports so you can plan better routes, dispatch drivers at the last minute, and share accurate ETAs with customers. With integrated dash cams, driver safety scores, and automatic alerts for speeding, idling, and geofences, Samsara helps you protect your business and assets. Samsara is an FMCSA-approved ELD.

related_products.short_desc: Transportation Management System (TMS) built on the latest cloud technology that scales to meet the unique needs of every supply chain.
related_products.features: Kuebix, a Trimble Company, offers a transportation management system (TMS) with Freight Intelligence that enables companies to capitalize on supply chain opportunities through visibility, control & the use of predictive analytics. Kuebix TMS is a modular solution that scales to meet the unique needs of every supply chain with a broad array of Premier Applications, Integrations & Managed Service Programs.  Built on the latest cloud technology, Kuebix delivers rapid implementations and a low TCO.

related_products.short_desc: No set-up fees. No contracts. Manage operations, dispatch, equipment, accounting & admin. Free driver phone app. From $99 to $239/mo
related_products.features: Award winning web-based transportation management software. No set-up fees. No contracts. Free trial. Tailwind's all-in-one TMS improves cash-flow & profits for small to mid-sized trucking companies, freight brokerages, and those that do both. Compete with the big guys - starting at just $99/month. Tailwind helps manage operations, customers, dispatch, admin & accounting. Also includes the free 'POD Complete' trucking app (Android & iPhone).

related_products.short_desc: MyCarrier makes LTL/TL shipping simple, fast, and cost-effective.
related_products.features: MyCarrier empowers LTL/TL shippers to connect directly to their carriers through an intuitive web platform for all shipping needs, from checking rates and availability to quoting, dispatching, and reporting. The MyCarrier platform streamlines the shipping process, allowing shippers to capture the best rates while increasing visibility, accuracy, and trust.

related_products.short_desc: Onfleet's software simplifies your local delivery operations from start to finish. Start your free trial today!
related_products.features: Onfleet's modern, Transportation Management software makes it easy for couriers to manage and analyze their local deliveries. Onfleet includes intuitive smartphone apps for drivers, a real-time web dashboard for dispatchers, and automated SMS notifications and driver tracking for your customers. Our API allows for integration into online ordering and other systems. Our software has powered millions of deliveries for couriers in 60+ countries around the world. Start your free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: With a Robust SaaS Platform , LogiNext saves more than 15% of logistics costs by optimizing your fleet, distribution routes & capacity.
related_products.features:
LogiNext's Dynamic TMS Software is a complete logistics optimization solution.
Over the years , we have helped close to 200+ Enterprise clients optimize their transportation & logistics bottlenecks.
Our wide feature set includes Seamless API integration, Automated Order Allocation, Multiple Planning Objectives, Trip Planning, Milestones based Delivery Tracking, Real Time Visibility, Dynamic Route Planning & Optimization, Delivery Associate Performance Analytics
To Learn More : Book a Demo

similar_products.short_desc: Axon is an all-in-one, totally integrated, real-time trucking software, meaning it seamlessly combines every area of your business.
similar_products.features: Visit our website for over 100 written and video reviews from Axon users. Since 1982 Axon has been providing software to trucking companies in North America. Axon is the only Trucking Dispatch and Accounting Software that is completely integrated in real-time. This means data only needs to be entered once to instantly update all systems automatically. Axon is used by hundreds of Highway Carriers, Oilfield and Aggregate trucking companies. Get your FREE demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Transportation management solution that helps trucking companies increase revenue, optimize fleet, decrease dead head miles,automate
similar_products.features:
World's First Digital Carrier Platform, Top #1 TMS with Autonomous Dispatching Technology. 

Most Advanced and Connected TMS. Our smart technology transforms your trucking business and automate your dispatch, fleet planning ,scheduling & load sourcing.

Single Window Platform that uses connected to all major loadboards,  digital brokers, fuel cards, factoring, eld, asset trackers, accounting. 

Loadstop is the Most advanced TMS available. Artificial Intelligence, NLP, ML, Cloud based TMS

similar_products.short_desc: Fully integrated freight, fleet, accounting & compliance. Our all-in-one platform is built for shippers, carriers, and brokerages.
similar_products.features: Every day, trucking companies throughout the country manage their businesses with our powerful, integrated, online Transportation Management System, Express Online. Whether you run Truckload, LTL, Intermodal or Brokerage, Express Online gives you the power to control your dispatch, accounting and fleet management with one TMS system available anytime, anywhere in the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: EXTRA offers advanced dispatch transportation management software that optimizes last mile deliveries.
similar_products.features: Last Mile/Local transportation and delivery management software! EXTRA has over two decades of innovation and experience to help power your last mile deliveries. EXTRA  transportation management software includes: automated dispatching; integrating multiple delivery options; real-time tracking and ETAs; customer notification options, including a real-time tracking link with map; live mobile SDK with map; customer portal and ETA API; route optimization; and, central dispatch to pool fleets.

similar_products.short_desc: Shop, ship, save, track, audit, and analyze, all with one login. Smart AI shipping software for all modes: Parcel, LTL/FTL, Intl Air.
similar_products.features: The premier cloud-based TMS software powered by AI, makes shipping and logistics simple with one login for all inbound and outbound transportation management across parcel, LTL, FTL, ocean, and air. Seamless integration into your ERP and order system, and configurable to your existing workflows. With connections to 600+ carriers, brokers, & marketplaces, getting the best rates and optimizing freight processes is easy. Trusted by Amazon, ebay, Toshiba, and Kyocera. Not for freight forwarders.

similar_products.short_desc: For over 40-years, thousands of drayage and intermodal carriers have relied on their Envase TMS to streamline and run more profitably.
similar_products.features: Envase Technologies has provided mission-critical, Intermodal and Drayage-focused transportation management system (TMS) software and mobile applications for over 40 years. The software merges order entry, dispatch, container tracking, electronic data interchange (EDI), API connectivity, document imaging, invoicing, settlements, and business intelligence, among other functions, into a single, streamlined system.

similar_products.short_desc: Keep drivers and shippers moving forward with seamless experiences.
similar_products.features: Manage transportation logistics at every stage of the journey. Whether shippers want to request pricing, check cargo conditions, or track shipments, they can do it all on the world's #1 CRM. Provide proactive service, send alerts, and answer questions accurately with a 360-degree view of shippers and consignees, and the transportation supply chain. Salesforce streamlines the entire shipping experience by integrating all of your systems and data onto a single platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Enveyo's transportation management software streamlines your parcel shipping operation with greater visibility and actionable data.
similar_products.features: Enveyo's transportation management software helps you streamline your parcel shipping operation with greater visibility, efficiency, and actionable data. Determine the best carrier and rate for every parcel through greater shipping visibility and time-in-transit reporting. Eliminate shipping mistakes caused by human error. And improve customer loyalty through real-time shipment notifications. Enveyo equips you with the necessary data and reporting for smarter shipping decisions.

similar_products.short_desc: Compare your contracted pricing, schedule pickups, prepare bills of lading, print labels, track data about your freight shipping.
similar_products.features: If you ship LTL freight or parcel, you can use Freightview to pull all of your negotiated LTL and parcel rates into one place so it's easy to compare your options and pick the best one. Then you can schedule pickups, prepare bills of lading, print shipping labels and track your shipments from pickup to delivery. Our unified address book means you never have to type an address twice. Plus you can visualize all of your shipping data as charts, graphs, reports and spreadsheet download.

similar_products.short_desc: Rose Rocket TMS helps trucking and logistics companies make their business operations more efficient from quote to cash.
similar_products.features:
Rose Rocket is a leading provider of transportation management software (TMS) built for modern trucking companies and brokerages. 

Input orders, generate rates and spot quotes, track & trace shipments, manage documents, invoice, and report on important business metrics from one system. 

Key features: Industry-leading Customer & Partner portals, Driver Mobile App, same-time planning and dispatching, live shipment ETA, consolidated invoicing & billing, real-time reporting, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Focused on efficiency, cost savings, customer service & driver retention, Trimble's Carrier TMS is designed with your success in mind.
similar_products.features: Trimble TMS for carriers, Innovative, TL2000, TMW.Suite and TruckMate include critical operations functionality such as load planning, route optimization, dispatch, tracking, and driver and equipment management, administrative functions such as invoicing, payroll, settlements, document management and accounting, and critical integrations such as ELD, maintenance, EDI, fuel cards and visibility.

similar_products.short_desc: Dispatch, Invoice, Prepare driver settlements, IFTA, Factoring schedules all in one click. Connect with drivers via ezLoads Driver App.
similar_products.features:
ezLoads is All-in-One software for trucking companies that allows to manage daily operations within one, integrated system. It's a web-based, intuitive, easy-to-use platform. Dispatch, Invoice, Organize loads, Prepare driver settlements, IFTA, Financial Reports, DOT compliance, Factoring integration, Fuel import, Dispatch board. 
ezLoads Driver App can be used as a PDF scanner or integrated with ezLoads TMS. Drivers can update load statuses and submit POD directly into the ezLoads TMS.

similar_products.short_desc: No set-up fees. No contracts. Manage operations, dispatch, equipment, accounting & admin. Free driver phone app. From $99 to $239/mo
similar_products.features: Award winning web-based transportation management software. No set-up fees. No contracts. Free trial. Tailwind's all-in-one TMS improves cash-flow & profits for small to mid-sized trucking companies, freight brokerages, and those that do both. Compete with the big guys - starting at just $99/month. Tailwind helps manage operations, customers, dispatch, admin & accounting. Also includes the free 'POD Complete' trucking app (Android & iPhone).

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fleet Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fleet Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fleet Maintenance software concentrates on repairs and the preventive maintenance aspect of managing business vehicles. Maintenance schedules, work orders, vehicle lifespan tracking, parts management, service records, etc. are typical functions for this type of software. Fleet Maintenance functionality would often be included as part of a more comprehensive Fleet Management package. For related solutions see also Aviation Maintenance, Equipment Maintenance, Maintenance Management, and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Fleet Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Fleet Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Fleet Management software gives fleet owners an overall picture of their vehicles. These solutions enable the management, tracking, maintenance, and accounting of vehicles and fleets. Fleet Management solutions help to schedule preventive maintenance activities, as well as vehicle licensing, repairs, and other information. Fuel tax records and driver logs are also common features in Fleet Management applications. Fleet Management software is related to Aviation Maintenance software, Equipment Maintenance software, Shipping software and Trucking software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Logistics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Logistics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Logistics software automates warehousing, transportation management, shipping and other logistical functions, monitoring the flow of products from supplier to end user. These applications provide a wide variety of features including: inventory control, warehousing, purchasing and receiving, sales and shipping, barcode / RFID scanning and label printing. Logistics solutions typically offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting, and business reporting tools. Logistics software is related to Distribution software, RFID software, Shipping software, Trucking software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Supply Chain Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Supply Chain Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Supply Chain Management software automates the flow of processes from raw materials through to delivery of finished goods to the consumer. These applications allow for organization-wide order processing, transportation and warehouse management along with planning and forecasting tools. Supply Chain Management software provides for efficient operation through the distribution and synchronization of this key data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Supply Chain Management software is related to Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Transportation Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Transportation Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Transportation Dispatch software allows dispatchers to view, track and manage dispatch activities from one central location. These solutions can track courier, delivery, service vehicles and trucking data. Shipment needs can be matched with available resources where optimal routes and loads can be determined. Transportation Dispatch software is related to Trucking software, Fleet Management software, Shipping Management software, Courier software, Service Dispatch software, and Logistics software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trucking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trucking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trucking software automates dispatch, fleet management, and maintenance for trucking companies. Trucking solutions can also be used for mapping routes and calculating industry standard ratings, practical miles, and fuel tax. These applications also often include driver log features, to regulate and record the number of hours operators spend on the road. Trucking software is related to Distribution software, Fleet Management software, Logistics software and Shipping software.

pricing_plans.name: Starter
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 50 shipments per month

pricing_plans.name: Bronze
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 500 shipments per month.

pricing_plans.name: Silver
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 1500 shipments and requires 2 users.

pricing_plans.name: Gold
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 3000 shipments and requires 3 users.

pricing_plans.name: Platinum
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 6000 shipments and requires 5 users.

pricing_plans.name: Enterprise
pricing_plans.description: This plan is for businesses with 10000 shipments and requires 10 users.
